title: Photograph, "Album: Address Book"
description: In the present object, an address book is photographed on the diagonal against a textured background, either fabric or carpet. The cover appears to be fabricated of gilt-edged black leather with rounded corners and is punctuated by a contrasting horizontal band positioned at center level and stretching from left-of-center to the right edge. Addresses, in a hand-lettered type, is imprinted in capitals on the band. An alphabetical index appears behind the cover at the right edge.
